conclusion: The velocity is perpendicular to the magnetic field only if the magnetic field is out of the plane.
The magnetic field is represented by crosses, indicating it's into the page.
The velocity component perpendicular to the magnetic field is just v.
The angle between velocity and magnetic field is 90 degrees.
The length of side CD in the magnetic field increases from 0 to a.
The maximum induced EMF should be B * a * v when l = a.
